about.title: I code, therefore I am.
about.infoOne: I am a young enthusiast who is keen on IT and anything about it since my first steps to High School. During the past few years, I gained lots of experience in this field due to the strong desire of becoming an expert. Today I am a senior front-end developer at one of the leading companies in the world.
about.infoTwo: “For me, web development is more than coding. It's a canvas with a blank page and I am the artist to paint it with colors of coding”.

skills.descriptionSkills: Learn about my skills in programming, find info on my language knowledge and more.
skills.descriptionExperience: Get to know the timeline of my education and  find out  more about  my working experience.
skills.descriptionPortfolio: My portfolio is my biggest  pride. Check my previous works and get to know my skills  better.

programsSkills.title: Programming skills
programsSkills.description: Front end engineer believing in the power of web development. Experienced in all stages of advanced front end development. Focused on single-page application development, CSS/JS animations, semantics, accessibility, and progressive enhancement. However, I'm keen on exploring new languages and I always try to stay up-to-minute. Apart from these, I have other computer skills, such as I fluently use Adobe XD and Sketch for designing the websites before coding them. I also have basic knowledge in 3D Max Studio and Adobe After Effect and I use them as a hobby.
